original_title: Kama Sutra: The Art of Making Love
overview: THE best Kama Sutra video, its full title is Penthouse Kama Sutra The Art of Making Love - Â©1993 A*Vision Entertainment, 60 minutes. It's not a typical porno-outfit produced silly multiple-hooking-up video, not hard-core. What it is is actual Kama Sutra positions from the Vatsayana book, done in a classy way, with good looking attractive actors, in pleasant surroundings, attractively lit, & irrestibly erotic. It has about a 10-12 minute introduction to the philosophy of Kama Sutra that is a good warm-up for those partners who might be a bit shy. The voice over explains each position in the repertoire, and why it might be a good one to explore. You'll be disappointed with anything less - Penthouse really should put this out on DVD!
title: Kama Sutra: The Art of Making Love
